details.arabic_diacless: البس جديدا وعش حميدا ومت شهيدا
details.arabic: اِلْبَسْ جَدِيْدًا وَعِشْ حَمِيْدًا وَمُتْ شَهِيدًا
details.transliteration: Ilbas jadeedan, wa 'ish hameedan, wa mut shaheedan.
details.translations: Wear anew, live commendably and die a shaheed.
details.reference: Ibn Majah 2/1178, Al-Baghawi 12/41. See also Al-Albani, Sahih Ibn Majah 2/275

pageTitle: To someone wearing a new garment #2
